list.s: “Get out!” said young Andrews, “and don‚Äôt show your face here‚Äî”
Well, if it flies in the face of what the Framers had in mind, then the question is, is there a way of interpreting their words that gives effect to what they had in mind, and the answer is yes.
[Beckett takes another document from Mercer, who is standing with Beckett, craggy face and pony tail]
[Bootstrap looks up from where he's sitting on a barrel, crabs scuttle across his face]
[Jack is now tied up to a bamboo pole and hanging face down over a pile of wood]
[a jar of eyeballs is hanging next to Ragetti's face as he speaks]
[Will turns the man's body over to see his face]
[the man's face is gone, his face is just a puckered piece of skin, which bulges outward]
[Jack grabs a branch from a vase, carries it in front of his face, attempts to walk out unseen]
[Jack slowly rises up to peer at the face of the compass]
[the face inside Hadrus' head turns around, turns into a hermit crab, extends its legs]
[Jack spots his hat, picks it up, puts it on, wipes slime from his face]
[the chest is opened, side view as Jones looks in, his face quivers]
Kiosko news face for el Salvador
Wishing the AC at work would stop pumping cold air in my face all day long.
We cannot truly face life until we face the fact that it will be taken away from us. - Billy Graham
